{{disambig-two|the former member of the [[Tolkien Society]]|series of books|[[Peter Roe Memorial Fund]]}}
'''Peter Roe''' (c. [[1963]]-[[1979]]) was a British Tolkien fan. Introduced to [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]] at the age of 16, Roe began making his own poems, maps and writing systems, but he died in a traffic accident before his work was done. His unfinished work, the ''Dwarvish Chronicles'', was later published by [[The Tolkien Society]] in [[Mallorn 15|''Mallorn'' 15]].

A short time later [[The Tolkien Society]] created the [[Peter Roe Memorial Fund]].
